question: What can I do when logged into My Account?
answer: When logged into My Account, you can play exclusive player games, keep track of your prizes, review and update your personal details, and view your active tickets.

question: What are Exclusive Player Games?
answer: Exclusive Player Games are daily games such as Big Quiz and Word Reveal, available only to registered players. Each time you play, you are entered into a weekly draw to win prizes like an iPad, smart TV or PS5.

question: When are Exclusive Player Game winners announced?
answer: Exclusive Player Game draws take place every Thursday, and winners are contacted by email on Fridays with details of how to claim their prize.

question: Can I update my personal details in My Account?
answer: Yes, you can review and update your correspondence address and contact information in My Account. For payment detail changes, you will need to contact Customer Experience.

question: Can I manage my tickets in My Account?
answer: You can view your active tickets in My Account. To add or cancel a ticket, please contact the Customer Experience team.

question: I can't log into My Account. What should I do?
answer: Make sure you have created a My Account using the email address registered to play. If you’ve forgotten your password, use the Reset Your Password link. If issues persist, call 0808 168 2511.

question: Why haven't I received an invitation to My Account as a new player?
answer: New players require additional checks before My Account can be created. Once complete, you will receive an email invitation, usually the next day.

question: How do I create a My Account?
answer: To create My Account, use the email address registered with People's Postcode Lottery. You’ll verify your email with a 6-digit code, choose a password, and confirm your identity using your date of birth.

question: Why is my My Account locked?
answer: Your account will be locked if you enter your password incorrectly five times. You can unlock it by resetting your password or calling Customer Experience on 0808 168 2511.

question: How do I change my My Account password?
answer: Log out of My Account, select Reset Your Password on the login page, enter your email address and follow the instructions sent by email. Passwords must be at least 12 characters and include at least three character types.

question: I've moved house. How can I change address or postcode so I play in my new street?
answer: To update your address and playing postcode, call Customer Experience on 0808 109 8765 with your full name, date of birth, previous address, full new address, new playing postcode, and updated contact details. You can also request the change via the Contact Us form or by writing to us.

question: How can I change my bank details?
answer: To change your bank details, call Customer Experience on 0808 109 8765 or use the Contact Us form. Changes to bank details cannot be made by post. Debit Card payment detail changes must be made by phone.

question: How can I change my personal information?
answer: You can update your name, correspondence address and phone numbers in My Account. To change your email address or playing postcode, call 0808 109 8765. You can also use the Contact Us form or write to us with your previous and new details.

question: How can I change the number of tickets I play?
answer: To change, add or reduce the number of tickets you play, call our Customer Experience team on 0808 109 8765. Making changes by phone allows us to confirm the updates and any final draw dates for cancelled subscriptions.

question: How can I cancel my People's Postcode Lottery subscription?
answer: You can cancel your People's Postcode Lottery subscription at any time by using the request to cancel form or by calling our freephone number 0808 109 8765.

question: What is the Postcode Lottery and how does it work?
answer: People's Postcode Lottery is a subscription-based lottery where players sign up with their postcode and pay £12.25 per month. Once their subscription starts, they are automatically entered into every draw, with prizes announced every day of the month.

question: What are the benefits of playing People's Postcode Lottery?
answer: There are £1,000 prizes announced every day, a share of £1 Million available on Saturdays, and monthly opportunities to win £250,000 per ticket in one winning postcode or a share of the Postcode Millions prize. Players are also automatically entered into all draws once subscribed.

question: How can I check if I have won a prize?
answer: You can check if you've won a prize by visiting the Lottery Results section on the website or by calling the freephone number 0808 109 8765. Winners are also notified by email, SMS, letter or phone call depending on the prize amount.

question: How much of my ticket price goes to charity?
answer: A minimum of 30% of each ticket price goes to supporting charities and good causes. Players have raised over £1.5 billion to help charities carry out vital work across the UK.

question: Can I make changes to my subscription instead of cancelling?
answer: Yes. If you would like to amend the number of tickets you play with or make other changes to your subscription, you can call the Customer Experience team on 0808 109 8765 to discuss your options.

question: How can I change my contact or bank details?
answer: To change your contact details or bank details, please call 0808 109 8765 or use the Contact Us form. Bank account changes cannot be requested by post, and Debit Card payment details must be updated by phone.

question: What are my chances of winning People's Postcode Lottery?
answer: In 2024, 87% of players won a prize, including cash prizes, vouchers and e-Gift Cards. For £12.25 per month, players are entered into all draws with winning postcodes announced every day. The likelihood of winning in future draws depends on the number of tickets and postcodes entered.

question: Will I still be charged for the next draw after cancelling?
answer: Once your subscription is cancelled, no further payments will be taken for future draws. Any payments already made or pending for upcoming draws will not be refunded, in line with the Terms and Conditions. Any resulting prize wins will still be paid, and the cancellation will take effect from the following month.

question: How can I stop receiving particular emails from People's Postcode Lottery?
answer: To stop receiving specific emails, click the Unsubscribe button in the footer of the email you no longer wish to receive. You will be taken to a webpage where you can manage and unsubscribe from future mailings of that type. Alternatively, you can call our Customer Experience team on freephone number 0808 109 8765 and they can update your contact preferences for you.
